translation.sobre: Full-Stack Developer with 3 years of experience, postgraduate in software architecture. I have experience in developing APIs using C# and .Net, Domain-Driven Design (DDD), Clean Architecture and Microservices, SQL, MongoDB. I also have knowledge in technologies such as Kafka, Docker, AWS and CI/CD tools. In addition, I have experience in developing visual interfaces using TypeScript, JavaScript, Angular and React.

caixa-web.descricao: I am currently working on the development of the company's billing and invoicing product using .Net, Angular, Oracle, and Kafka. I apply Domain-Driven Design (DDD) principles and Clean Architecture. I also utilize agile methodologies, including Scrum and Kanban, for project management.

grc.cargo: Gestão de Risco ao Crédito - Full-Stack Developer
grc.descricao: I worked on the development team for the financial credit analysis product using .Net, Angular, MongoDB, and SQS. I played a crucial role in developing the automated analysis process, implementing the asynchronous queue process with SQS, and restructuring attachment storage. Additionally, we used the Scrum agile methodology.

aksie.descricao: I worked as a Front-end Developer for a financial management platform, utilizing Angular, TypeScript, and SASS technologies.

quasar.descricao: E-commerce project developed as a team for learning purposes, utilizing Angular for the front-end and C# for the back-end.

PicPayChallenge.descricao: Technical challenge at PicPay, including the implementation of Kafka and integration with PagSeguro for various payment methods.

Aluraflix.descricao: Project developed during the fifth edition of Alura's backend challenge. Built using Angular, C#, Asp.Net, and MySQL.
